section.46: The Book of Cutting off the Hand of the Thief

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Ibn Muhairiz said; "I asked Fadalah bin 'Ubaid about hanging the hand (of the thief) from his neck, and he said:'It is Sunnah. The Messenger of Allah cut off a thief's hand then hung it from his neck."'(Daif)
